channel.title: Google AdSense - Hide IP
channel.description:
Hard to explain question - lets say you use google adsense on your website, can you proxy your IP and keep changing your IP with like Hide IP and click ads and it count per click, or does it still detect you as the same IP and it doesnt count as another click?
Example: my normal IP is 999.999.999 and I click an ad, I make a cent. then I use hide IP to proxy my IP and show as a different IP, and now my IP is a proxy - 999.888.999, does it count as another click(I make another cent) or does it know its a proxy and doesnt count?(I don't make another cent)
Hard to explain...Anyways. Thats my question.

item.title: Google AdSense - Hide IP
item.dc:creator: @Gravey Gravey
item.description:
@Gravey wrote:

The problem with AdSense is that they mail you checks though No paypal money

Read full topic

item.title: Google AdSense - Hide IP
item.dc:creator: @Cultivated Cultivated
item.description:
@Cultivated wrote:

Well, I’ll just have to try it out, if I get dropped…the risk is half the fun! ;D

But you know, if they don’t get me :|…I getta few cents

Read full topic

item.title: Google AdSense - Hide IP
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Google has search historys on me from over a year ago, so I’m presuming they will detect it.

The way I see it, a person using a proxy to click ads and close the window is like 1 + 1, won’t take Google long to add it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Google AdSense - Hide IP
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

And you can give people your referral ip for people to install Firefox…$1

Read full topic

item.title: Google AdSense - Hide IP
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

I assume it would detect something fishy eventually, google is smart… And as soon as they find out you’ve done something against their TOS then you get dropped from adsense (from what i’ve heard).

Here’s a suggestion though: You get $2 per google pack installation, install it on every school computer/local library… I made a pretty penny this way

Read full topic
